svg.text: Mid Point First Order Line Drawing Algorithm
For a Line :if dx > dy : plot x
For a Line :if dx > dy : plot x
if we select the point F(X,Y)
then, there could be two possible valuesof Next mid points which will decide the Next Point and act like a decision parameter for the Next to the Next Point:
Next decision parameter is defined by only one previous decision parameter
Multiply by 2 on LHS doesnot affect sign
x1,y1 is initial point of theline so F(x1,y1) = 0 becausepoint is on the line
